Japan Top 100 Games' Sales Figures For 2003; MF4 Makes the List
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2004 Topics (Year of the Venture): Japan Top 100 Games' Sales Figures For 2003; MF4 Makes the List
By Lisa Shock on Sunday, February 1, 2004 - 07:53 pm:

Ok, well, I think we had all hoped that MF4 would do better, but here's the final numbers for the year 2003:

Monster Farm 4 sold 183,784 copies in 2003, making it #73 in Japan for the year.

Now, it's true that the Japanese version has a serious bug, making it impossible to play beyond the game's credits sequence, and that undoubtedly affected sales. It did sell slightly more copies than MF3 did in Japan (182,942).

HERE is a link to the complete list.

By CHB on Sunday, February 1, 2004 - 08:08 pm:

Not the best sales, but these are Japan only. Hopefully, by this summer, sales will pick up, at least elsewhere. Heres hoping.
